Name: WB004 - pdf for the request a new website page form
Output_template:
{"name":"{reference}","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":" {#PDF_Top_Logo}
 
 
 

{form_name} ({case_ref})

Your details

{#customer/SF_Sum}

Website details

Purpose

What is the purpose of the website? {#purpose}

About the organisation

Describe what the organisation does, its products/services and main message to its audience {#describeOrg}

Target audience

Describe the target market for the organisation {#describeTarget}

Website activities and objectives

Describe the major objectives for the website and the activities you would like users to perform. What are the main calls to action? How can we measure the success of the website? {#describeObjectives}

Website structure

Outline the web pages required for when the website is launched. Where repeating pages such as staff profiles for a 'meet the team' page or news articles for a blog, indicate the number of items that you would like created. {#websiteStructure}

Website features

Detail any special features required beyond basic pages. List any interactions with users or connections to external systems. Include reference links where possible. {#websiteFeatures}

Websites you like

List websites that you would like your website to look like, stating what you like or dislike about them. These could be similar or completely unrelated organisations that have aspects you would like to replicate on your website. If you already have a website, are there elements that you want to keep? {#websiteYouLike}

Design

Provide a short brief on the visual design of the website. Reference any branding guidelines or colours that need to be considered. {#design}
Will you provide images or will we need to source them? {provideImages}

Other requirements

Provide details on the following requirements: website address (existing or new), hosting, accessibility, languages, security, content management, ongoing maintenance, training and search engine optimisation. {#otherRequirements}

Completion date

Desired completion date {desiredCompletion}
"}
